PUBLIC_KEY.description: The public key for the Discord API application

OPSGENIE_TOKEN.description: The API token for Opsgenie, only required for the errors cog

MICROSOFT_TRANSLATE_KEY.description: API key for Microsoft translate, only required for the translate cog

MICROSOFT_TRANSLATE_REGION.description: The region for Microsoft translate, only required for the translate cog

CHAIN_PIN_THRESHOLD.description: Threshold to pin break messages for chainforever, only required for the fun cog

LOG_CHANNEL.description: The ID of the channel you want the bot to use to say that it is online

AUTOLOAD_COGS.description: Comma seperated list of cogs to load when the bot starts

ACTIVITY_TYPE.description: The type of activity, must be playing, watching, streaming, listening, competing or custom

STATUS.description: The bot's status, must be online, idle, dnd or invisable
